Items.Name: Sneakers
Items.Description: Sneakers with a padded upper edge and tongue and lacing at front. Leather lining, leather insoles, and patterned rubber soles. Sole thickness approx. 1 1/2 in.

Items.Name: Sandals
Items.Description: Slides in soft leather with adjustable straps. Molded suede insoles and patterned soles.

Items.Name: Straw Hat
Items.Description: Hat in braided paper straw. Rounded crown and a wide, flat brim. Grosgrain sweatband.

Items.Name: Jersey
Items.Description: Regular-fit, comfortable jacket in bouclé jersey with classic silhouette. Collar, zipper at front, welt front pockets, and long sleeves. Unlined.

Items.Name: Trench coat
Items.Description: Oversized, knee-length trench coat in woven fabric with a baggy, extra-loose silhouette. Notched lapels, buttons at front, and a removable tie belt at waist. Long sleeves with adjustable tab at cuffs, welt side pockets, and two inner pockets. Vent at back. Lined.

Items.Name: Car Coat
Items.Description: Regular-fit car coat in soft twill with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Collar with collar strap. Concealed buttons at front, diagonal welt front pockets, and a welt inner pocket. Long sleeves with tab and button at cuffs. Lined.

Items.Name: Denim Jacket
Items.Description: Relaxed-fit jacket in non-stretch denim. Collar, metal buttons at front, chest pockets with flap and button, and welt side pockets. Long sleeves with button at cuffs. Adjustable tab at sides with buttons.

Items.Name: Windbreaker
Items.Description: Windbreaker in windproof, water-repellent nylon. Lined hood with elasticized drawstring. Zipper at front, long sleeves with covered elastic at cuffs, and a concealed, elasticized drawstring at hem. Diagonal side pockets with hook-loop fastener and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Lined.

Items.Name: Baseball Jacket
Items.Description: Baseball jacket in satin. Stand-up collar, snap fasteners at front, and long sleeves. Diagonal welt front pockets, an inner pocket with snap fastener, and ribbing at collar, cuffs, and hem. Lined.

Items.Name: Vest
Items.Description: Regular-fit, lightly padded vest in thick woven fabric with comfortable, classic silhouette. Stand-up collar, diagonal front pockets with zipper, and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Elasticized binding at armholes and hem. Fleece lined.

Items.Name: Bomber
Items.Description: Bomber jacket in felted fabric with sleeves in coated fabric. Drawstring hood in jersey, snap fasteners at front, welt front pockets, and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Striped ribbing at cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.

Items.Name: Twill Shacket
Items.Description: Regular-fit shirt jacket in thick cotton twill with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Collar, buttons at front, an open chest pocket, and long sleeves. Straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Items.Name: Ski Anorak
Items.Description: Loose-fit, padded ski anorak in StormMove™ functional fabric for breathability and protection from wind and snow. Hood with elasticized drawstring at back to help keep it in place. Half-zip with anti-chafe chin guard. Chest pocket with zipper and a goggle cloth, handwarmer pockets with zipper, and a sleeve pocket with zipper for easy access to lift pass. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with adjustable hook-loop tab at cuffs, and jersey inner ribbing with thumbhole. Slit at one side with zipper and an elasticized drawstring at hem. Fully taped seams, water column rating of 10,000 mm., and breathability 10,000 g/m2/24 h. Made with ThermoMove™ technology, designed to be lightweight, breathable, and keep you warm when the temperature drops.

Items.Name: Coated Jacket
Items.Description: Regular-fit jacket in coated, woven fabric with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Collar, zipper at front, welt front pockets, and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Long sleeves and wide ribbing at cuffs and hem.

Items.Name: Hoodie
Items.Description: Long-sleeved sweatshirt hoodie with soft, brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, and ribbing at cuffs and hem.

Items.Name: Cotton Dress
Items.Description: Loose-fit, knee-length, A-line dress in woven cotton fabric. Round neckline with V-shaped opening and narrow ties at front. Gently dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves with a gathered seam at top, and narrow elastic at cuffs. Gathered seam at lower section for added volume. Unlined.
